revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Stark Mountain |image = [[File:Stark Mountain.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Stark Mountain. |tokens = 96,500 |location = North of Route 227. }} '''Stark Mountain''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Sinnoh]]. It has 64 tiles arranged in an 8x8 square, including 8 chest tiles, 19 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile.
==Dungeon Stats==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Random Encounter || 2,203,000 |- | Skarmory (Boss) || 8,000,000 |- | Heatran (Boss) || 9,000,000 |}
==Pokémon==
* Golbat * Graveler * Fearow * Weezing * Rhyhorn * Rhydon * Numel * Slugma * Magcargo * Camerupt * Skarmory (boss) * Heatran (boss)
==Items==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | {{Bag3|X Click}} [[XClick|xClick]] || 50% |- | {{Bag3|Item Magnet}} [[Item Magnet]] || 50% |}
[[Category:Dungeons]]
